Index » Filesystem

Class: Filesystem

Defined in: lib\src\Konsserto\Component\Filesystem\Filesystem.coffee

Overview

Filesystem contains helper to generate and manage directory/file tree

Author:

  • Jessym Reziga jessym@konsserto.com

Class Method Summary

  • . (void) traceOutput(object) Trace the output stack
  • . (Boolean) mktree(root, tree, chmod = 755, verbose = true) Make tree
  • . (void) mkfiles(root, files) Make files
  • . (void) mkdir(dir, chmod, del = false) Make directory
  • . (void) rmtree(dir) Remove tree
  • . (void) copytree(src, dst) Copy tree
  • . (Object) generatetree(src, root = {}) Generate a tree

Class Method Details

. (void) traceOutput(object)

Trace the output stack

Parameters:

  • object ( Object ) — The object concern by the trace

. (Boolean) mktree(root, tree, chmod = 755, verbose = true)

Make tree

Parameters:

  • root ( String ) — The root directory
  • tree ( Object ) — The tree object
  • chmod ( Number ) — The access right on the directory
  • verbose ( Boolean ) — Should the mktree be logged ?

Returns:

  • ( Boolean ) — True if created, false in the other cases

. (void) mkfiles(root, files)

Make files

Parameters:

  • root ( String ) — The root directory
  • files ( Object ) — The files to make

. (void) mkdir(dir, chmod, del = false)

Make directory

Parameters:

  • dir ( String ) — The directory to make
  • chmod ( Number ) — The chmod used to create
  • Should ( Boolean ) — the directory be deleted before ? Default is false

. (void) rmtree(dir)

Remove tree

Parameters:

  • dir ( String ) — The directory to remove

. (void) copytree(src, dst)

Copy tree

Parameters:

  • src ( String ) — The directory to copy
  • dst ( String ) — The destination folder

. (Object) generatetree(src, root = {})

Generate a tree

Parameters:

  • src ( String ) — The dsource directory where to gene
  • root ( Object ) — The root object

Returns:

  • ( Object ) — The root object
